question_stem: When assessing robustness of an estimator, one of the properties we consider is the breakdown point.For a particular parameter of interest, an estimator with a large breakdown point is considered to be better than an estimator with a smaller breakdown point.
question_stem_html:
When assessing robustness of an estimator, one of the properties we consider is the breakdown point.
For a particular parameter of interest, an estimator with a large breakdown point is considered to be better than an estimator with a smaller breakdown point.

When assessing robustness of an estimator, one of the properties we consider is the breakdown point.
